title: Multimedia Utilization Strategy Design for Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design optimized for smartphone-based field-intensive educational environments.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three multimedia content creation tools suitable for physical education lesson design.
Learners can successfully operate physical education multimedia materials in a smartphone-based PBL environment with over 90% success.
Learners can design interactive multimedia assessment tools to improve learner engagement by at least 40%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
